message:
السلام عليكم
محتاج كود دوت نت بيعمل push notification 
Asp.Net C Sharp
لتطبيقات موبايل 
Android, IOS
وجزاكم الله خيراً

data.message:
You can use Microsoft SignalR on Android & iOS

https://github.com/SignalR/java-client
https://github.com/DyKnow/SignalR-ObjC

SignalR بيعمل real-time app
هو بيسأل عن
Push Notification
يعني حاجة تكلم سيرفر جوجل وأبل عشان تبعت تنبيهات.. والتنبيهات يعني البرنامج مغلق
SignalR  بيحتاج ان البرنامج يكون شغال

Also you can use Parse Service .. it has an Android and IOS SDk .. and restful API to push notification from C#.
http://parse.com/

Azure Notification Hubs gives you Push Notification for iOS, Android and Windows Phone (and Windows 8) and has libraries for all backends (including .Net of course) and has a free plan which gives you 1 million notifications per month :)
http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/notification-hubs/
I haven't tried it myself though, but it will be the first thing I try when I need this functionality :)
